html-how-the-web-works.q: Which protocol does the browser typically use to request web pages?
html-how-the-web-works.feedbackOk: Correct — HTTP(S) is used for web requests.
html-how-the-web-works.feedbackNo: Not quite. Web pages are fetched over HTTP or HTTPS.
